items.sentence: Tom wondered whether Mary would like the gift he bought her.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice were all born on October 20, 2013.
I just sat there trying not to think about how alone I felt.
I was just about to leave the house when the telephone rang.
Tom wanted to help Mary, but he didn\'t know where to begin.
Tom wanted to prepare a special dinner for Mary\'s birthday.
Tom wants me to tell Mary that she can\'t come here anymore.
I want to know why you weren\'t at the meeting this morning.
It\'s not going to be easy to do that without a lot of help.
It\'s unlikely that Tom will get out of prison anytime soon.
